content: Hello -- would it be possible to update the Zulip backend running on zulipchat.com? Our PR to fix a small grammar issue went in almost a month ago (https://github.com/zulip/zulip/commit/92fefa0e7e0574a1365a4191ac7eec0846d44296) and doesn't look to have made it to deployment. It is slowly driving me crazy because we use this integration many times per day. :-)
@Keith Winstein yep, that's actually planned for later today :)
